scripts.build:debug:
echo "Building WEB (debug)" && mkdir -p dist && printf '

Debug Web

' > dist/index.html
scripts.build:test:
echo "Building WEB (test)" && mkdir -p dist && printf '

Test Web

' > dist/index.html
scripts.build:release:
echo "Building WEB (release)" && mkdir -p dist && printf '

Release Web

' > dist/index.html
scripts.build:release-protected:
echo "Building WEB (release-protected)" && mkdir -p dist && printf '

Release-Protected Web

' > dist/index.html
